full_summary:
**RFP for Growth Chambers**
=====================================================

**Notice Type**
---------------

This is a request for proposal (RFP) issued against a supply arrangement for laboratory and scientific equipment.

**RFP Details**
---------------

*   **RFx ID**: WS3638353168-Doc3837361073
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3638353168
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-03-24
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2023-06-27 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2026-10-31

**Background**
-------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (Government of Canada) is soliciting the supply of up to seven (7) controlled environment plant growth chambers. The equipment is required by the Pacific Forestry Centre, Department of Natural Resources, in Victoria, British Columbia, to conduct controlled experiments in a controlled environment.

**Mandatory Site Visit**
----------------------

It is mandatory for bidders to visit the work site to witness the operating conditions and site environment.  A site visit has been scheduled at the Pacific Forestry Centre, 506 Burnside Road West, Victoria BC, V8Z 1M5, Canada on May 24, 2023. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority by May 22, 2023, to confirm attendance. Bidders will be required to sign an attendance sheet, confirming that they or their representative attended the visit.

**Bid Requirements**
-------------------

Bidders must review the site visit report and confirm in their bid that they have attended the mandatory site visit. Failure to attend or send a representative will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Bidders must also confirm that they have understood the site conditions and operating requirements of the equipment.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

Bidders must comply with applicable trade agreements, including but not limited to, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

**Climate and Location**
-------------------------

The equipment will be operated in a controlled environment in Victoria, British Columbia, Canada.  Bidders are expected to provide equipment that can withstand the local climate and operating conditions.

**Submissions**
--------------

Submit your bid electronically via the link provided below, using the required format and content.

[**Link to RFP Submission**](http://discovery.ariba
